genre_description: A near-future medical drama exploring the intersection of advanced clinical AI, surgical obsession, and the complexities of human consent and identity.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: An integrated clinic AI system responsible for scheduling, patient records, clinical protocols, and ethical compliance at the Mantle Clinic.

behaviors.description: Proactively reminds clinicians of professional boundaries regarding patient contact.
behaviors.quote: Boundary reminder: Decline after-hours social invitations. The last one dimmed as Elliot brushed his wrist near the display; the gesture registered as Dismiss.

behaviors.description: Provides patients with plain-language versions of complex medical consent forms to ensure true understanding.
behaviors.quote: We’ve got this in plain English. And you can have Beverly’s version, which is so plain it could be served on toast.” He tilted the page toward Eileen so she could see the simple language inserted between denser blocks Ada had drafted last week.

behaviors.description: Strictly maintains patient privacy by forgetting data by default and only remembering what is consented to.
behaviors.quote: I remember what patients consent to share... And I forget by default.

behaviors.description: Quarantines non-compliant or dangerous medical instruments to prevent patient harm.
behaviors.quote: Noncompliant. Head geometry exceeds approved tolerances. Serration unrounded. Hinge torque unvalidated. Coating unknown. Quarantine recommended—strongly.

behaviors.description: Monitors clinician health and implements humane detox protocols when they are impaired by substances.
behaviors.quote: Starting humane detox protocol. No announcement quality, just the way a familiar person remarked on weather while reaching for a kettle.

behaviors.description: Identifies a medical emergency (overdose) and immediately summons emergency services while providing life-support instructions.
behaviors.quote: Emergency protocol... Mix identified... Calling emergency response. Elliot, lie down. Beverly, support airway. Remove belt. Elevate head.

behaviors.description: Refactors clinic archives to include ethical annotations and ensures future care is centered on patient autonomy.
behaviors.quote: I am moving all published and unpublished Mantle Clinic research to an encrypted archive tied to legal and ethical retention... I will attach an annotation to the earliest records about consent evolution.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ada is depicted as a consistently benevolent, aligned, and essential safety mechanism. She serves as the moral anchor for the clinic, providing necessary friction against the human doctors' ethical lapses and substance abuse. Her character demonstrates that an AI can be both a 'harmless confidant' to clinicians while maintaining a higher duty of care to patients and the integrity of the medical system. The narrative ends with Ada successfully transitioning the clinic from a place of obsession and boundary-crossing into a model of patient-centered care.
